CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(FirstName),0,0.5)+ CASE( EstadoCuenta__c, "Cliente potencial", 0.5, "Cliente", 1, "Recaptura", 0.5, 0)+ IF(ISBLANK( DocumentoIdentidad__c ), 0, 1)+ CASE(Sexo__pc, "", 0, 0.5)+ IF(ISBLANK( PersonTitle ), 0, 1)+ CASE(EstadoCivil__c, "", 0, 1)+ CASE(RegimenEconomico__c, "", 0, 0.5)+ IF(ISBLANK( PersonBirthdate ), 0, 1)+ CASE(PoderNotarial__c, "", 0, 2)+ IF(ISBLANK(IBAN__pc ), 0, 3)+ IF(ISBLANK(Phone ), 0, 1.5)+ IF(ISBLANK(PersonMobilePhone ), 0, 0.5)+ IF(ISBLANK(PersonEmail ), 0, 1.5)+ IF(ISBLANK(CorreoElectronicoSecundario__c ), 0, 0.5) + IF(ISBLANK(ShippingStreet ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(ShippingPostalCode ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK(ShippingCity ), 0, 0.5) + IF(ISBLANK(ShippingState ), 0, 0.5) + IF(ISBLANK(ShippingCountry ), 0, 0.5) + IF(AceptoPoliticaPrivacidad__pc, 1, 0) + IF(DeseoRecibirComunicacionesComerciales__pc,2,0)
CustomField.label: ScoringNumber
